name: daily_sentiment
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sentitrade.
Tool description: JSON web API that performs NLP sentiment analysis on news headlines for stocks and cryptocurrencies, grading daily collective news sentiment. DISCLAIMER: this prototype version currently only supports Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH). Consider donating to support full development at main site: https://www.sentitrade.net/
API description: Returns asset ticker queried, sentiment score, date queried, and number of articles used to calculate the sentiment score.

symbol.description: The asset ticker symbol to query.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the sentiment score in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
